casebody.data:
Frank WOJCIK, Plaintiff,
v.
MERCHANTS METALS, LLC, Defendant/Third-Party Plaintiff-Appellant,
and
Access America Transport, Inc., Third-Party Defendant/Cross-Plaintiff-Appellee,
and
Determined Transportation, LLC, Third-Party Defendant/Cross-Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158683
COA: 338682 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 2, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 2, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
